start.text: You're either the person who hired me, or you're in my way. Which is it?

choices.text: You're the one in my way.
[Marksmanship] I'm not looking for a fight, but I don't miss.

neutral_response.text: Good choice. Don't let me see you again.

hostile_response.text: That's a mistake you won't live to regret.

choices.text: I need you to take care of someone.

marksmanship_success.text: I can see that. You've got the look of a professional. I respect that. I'll let you pass... this time.
